Package ohos.media.image.common

Class Size

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.image.common.Size

  • public class Size
extends Object
    Provides image size information, includes the width and height.
    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#IMAGE
